html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2025-03022025-03-07PS
ActEmergency Management Act
SubjectProvincial Emergency Financial Assistance Order No. 276, Nova Scotia
PrecisPROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 276 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Nova Scotia with respect to the rainstorm that occurred from July 11 to July 12, 2024.
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: PROVINCIAL EMERGENCY FINANCIAL ASSISTANCE ORDER No. 276 in order to (1) declare the natural disaster to be of concern to the federal government; and (2) authorize the provision of financial assistance to Nova Scotia with respect to the rainstorm that occurred from July 11 to July 12, 2024.
